item.description:
Share the holiday spirit and join us for dinner and drinks at the Aegean Restaurant in Framingham for our annual holiday get together. Please bring a holiday ornament with you because we will be doing an ornament swap.

The Aegean has delicious food and a terrific atmosphere. We will be meeting for dinner, then head over to the bar area for after dinner drinks. It is a very popular location!

Have fun celebrating the holiday season and meeting friendly and fun people. We will be sharing stories about the worst and best Christmas gifts we ever got and fun holiday traditions!

Everyone pays for their own food/drink
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside restaurant. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Holiday Dinner, Drinks and Ornament Swap at the Aegean Restaurant, Framingham
